2015/KER/782
B. KEMAL PASHA, J.
Cril.M.C. No.83 of 2015
Dated this the 8" day of January, 2015
ORDER
Learned counsel for the petitioner seeks
permission to withdraw the Crl.M.C. Permission is granted.
Accordingly, this Crl.M.C. is dismissed as withdrawn, with
liberty to move other Crl.M.C., if so advised, at appropriate
stage.
The documents produced by the petitioner are ordered
to be returned to the petitioner.
Sd/-
(B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE)
